update: **Custom mod access.** Previously, only server admins could use mod commands. Now you can manage LeagueBot-specific mods with `!mod @RandomUser` and `!unmod @RandomUser`.

**Better balanced teams.** A couple bugs in the auto-balancer ðŸ¤– have now been fixed, so your teams should be more even. (Reminder: to use this feature fully, users need to have Discord roles for their RL ranks, ex. Gold, Diamond, SSL, etc.)

**Custom/default command prefix.** Now, use `!` as the default prefix, ex. `!queue` in any channel to use LeagueBot. You can also now set a custom prefix - ex. to use `?` instead, run `!prefix ?`. (This is an admin-only command.)
**Cancel a match before it's fully made.** Try it out by voting ðŸš« instead of for a random or auto balanced match.
**Periodic update notifications.** A quicker, smoother way to let you know of new changes - just like this!
